mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, password, create_time, update_time, record_status FROM TBL_users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_users (user_id, user_name, password, create_time, update_time, record_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{recordStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_users SET user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, update_time = #{updateTime}, record_status = #{recordStatus} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
